participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active and determined, Emily is passionate about tennis and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i am married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Larry loves cooking and has a knack for fishing, making him a true culinary artist.
participant_2.background: spiderman is my favorite. if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. hey my name is larry and i am a chef.
